title: How has technology changed fashion? - Quora

response.answer_text: At the highest level it has made it possible to create and manufacture designs that could never have existed before and fabrics with wondrous abilities. At its lowest level, it has allowed mass production to reach a dangerous amount of pollution and piles of cheap, throw-away clothes that are overflowing landfills or wherever they are disposed of. Plus, now everyone’s outfit looks alike in jeans or sweatpants and a tee. Instead of looking like a fleet of sleek Star Trekkies, the masses look like a sea of rumpled, present day peasants ready to riot. And don’t even get me started on fleece!!!!
